item.title: Whip emote help
item.dc:creator: @sickamore sickamore
item.description:
@sickamore wrote:

ugh, when i change these i dc when i attack:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) { animation(341, EnemyY, EnemyX); }
and:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) { animation(341, EnemyY, EnemyX); }
i changed it to 1658 and i dc when i attack.

item.title: Whip emote help
item.dc:creator: @sickamore sickamore
item.description:
@sickamore wrote:

Guys i need help changing the whip attack. it does the special every single time i want to change it to 1658.

if (wearID == 4151) { // Abyssal Whip playerSEW = 1658; playerSER = 1661; playerSE = 1832; playerSEA = 341; }
thats my whip

Read full topic
